functional.notes: init supports --with-placeholders and placeholder outputs are deterministic/minimal.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/bundle.py ensure_placeholder_outputs_v1() writes minimal files if missing.
findings: events.json placeholder is an empty array; tracks.jsonl placeholder is empty JSONL.
sync.json placeholder is only created when sensors_present=true.

correctness_safety.notes: Placeholders are gated behind explicit flag and do not overwrite existing files.

security.notes: No external calls; writes scoped within bundle root.
findings: Uses Path operations and fixed relative paths.

maintainability.notes: Placeholder behavior is isolated in bundle helper.
findings: Easy to extend placeholder set if contract evolves.

summary.notes: Meets acceptance; consider adding a smoke test that init+placeholders passes validate.
